price: "Não há senão nossa vida terrena; morremos e vivemos e não seremos ressuscitados
arabic: إِنۡ هِيَ إِلَّا حَيَاتُنَا ٱلدُّنۡيَا نَمُوتُ وَنَحۡيَا وَمَا نَحۡنُ بِمَبۡعُوثِينَ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: in hiya illā ḥayātunā al-dun'yā namūtu wanaḥyā wamā naḥnu bimabʿūthīna
